articles.description: If there ever was a fairytale land then this is it. The Loire Valley in central France abounds with hundreds of castles reminiscent of when it was home to French royals. From blockbuster landmarks to lesser known spots, as well as hotels, these are my top pic…
articles.title: What To Do In The Loire Valley On Your Next Visit
